meanings.definition: Of or relating to a pentagon.
meanings.sent1: The pentagonals shape had five equal sides.

meanings.definition: A polygon with five sides and five angles.
meanings.sent1: The children learned about pentagonals in geometry class.
meanings.sent2: The pentagonals on the flag represented unity.
meanings.sent3: The pentagonals on the dice made the game more interesting.
meanings.sent4: The pentagonals of the starfish fascinated the marine biologist.
meanings.sent5: The pentagonals of the crystal reflected the light beautifully.

meanings.definition: A shape or object with five sides or angles.
meanings.sent1: The table had a unique pentagonals design.
